Name: Miracle Eye
Effect: Target Self. The User's Psychic-Type Moves ignore Dark-Type Immunity. Target cannot Evade the User's Moves. This Pokemon's Accuracy cannot be Reduced by Move's, Items or Abilities (ie Sand Attack, Bright Powder, etc.). Whole Scene Duration
